Snow in United States

How much snow did United States ski resorts get? Find the latest snow reports for United States mountains, updated daily throughout the winter season with new snow totals for the last day or three days. See United States ski resorts' open/closed operating status, upper mountain and lower mountain base depths, number of open lifts, and total amount of open acreage. Click the weather icon for a detailed weather forecast of any United States ski resort or visit a resort’s “Full Report” for additional snow report information. Select the blue camera icon to view webcams of today's ski conditions, and click any United States resort name for ski area stats and overview. Click Add to Compare to see a side-by-side comparison of up to 10 ski resorts at a time. United States snow reports are sourced directly from the ski resorts and are only recorded during the official ski season's opening to closing dates.
